text: Lechia Gdańsk is a Polish football club from Gdańsk which plays in the Ekstraklasa. The club was founded in 1945. == Honours == Ekstraklasa * Third place: 1956, 2018–19 Polish Cup * Winners: 1982–83, 2018–19 * Runners-up: 1955, 2019–20 Polish Super Cup: * Winners: 1983, 2019 I liga * Winners: 1951, 1983–84, 2007–08 * Runners-up: 1954, 1974–75, 1975–76, 1977–78 * Third place: 1978–79 II liga * Winners: 1971–72, 1982–83, 2004–05 * Runners-up: 1967–68, 1970–71 * Third place: 1969–70, 1997–98 European competitions * European Cup Winners Cup: ** First round: 1983–84 * Europa League ** Second qualifying round: 2019–20 == Other websites == * Official website Category:1945 establishments in Europe Category:1940s establishments in Poland Category:Polish football clubs Category:Gdańsk
title: Lechia Gdańsk
